column1: elizabeth ""libby"" heath shuford| elizabeth ""libby"" heath shuford. born: february 05
column3: 2015. local florists send gifts new ellenton
column6: beloved wife of james e. shuford
column10: at her residence surrounded by her loving family. a native and life-long resident of aiken
column11: libby was a daughter of the late harry h. and ruth richardson heath. she was a bookkeeper and retired from wyatt development. she was a member of town creek baptist church. surviving are her husband of 54 years
column18: north augusta. in addition to her parents
column19: she was preceded in death by a brother
column20: edward jake heath. the family will receive friends monday evening from 6 until 8 oclock at shellhouse rivers funeral home. the funeral service will be tuesday morning at 11 oclock at town creek baptist church with the revs. clint smith
column21: don lemon and jim osteen officiating. interment will follow in southlawn cemetery. pallbearers will be ron floyd
column25: kent shuford and bernard rowland. memorial contributions may be directed to town creek baptist church building fund
column33: 201511:00 amtown creek baptist church 250 town creek rd aiken
